Affinity Diagramming can Show Prejudice

Aug 9, 2011

Affinity Diagramming is organizing data in a hierarchy using post it notes. Under “economic status of students” there was one sticky at the bottom that caught my attention: “Asian/Hispanic”.

Wilcox Williams is based in New York and Pittsburgh and has worked with clients around the world.
